actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to change the method of computing annuities of employees with at least 5 but less than 20 years of service as law enforcement officers or firefighters.

summary.text: Provides that the annuity of a Federal employee retiring with at least 5 years but less than 20 years of service as a law enforcement officer or firefighter, or any combination thereof, shall be computed with respect to such service by multiplying 2 1/2 percent of his average pay by the years of such service. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8339)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to change the method of computing annuities of employees with at least 5 but less than 20 years of service as law enforcement officers or firefighters.
